name: Platfurmer (Prototype)
description:
Press Enter to select an option in the main menu (Only Start and Quit works)

Left and Right arrow to move.

S to jump

Left+S to wall jump right

Right+S to wall jump left

E to enter edit mode, press space to add a block ( 1, 2, 3 changes the type of block, [1]Add Block, [2]Remove Block, [3]Finish Line (doesn't work) )

R to quit edit mode

F for fullscreen

Q to zoom in and out

Z for toggling lazer sight (the gun can't shoot)
